getProfileInform: SELECT UserAccountID, Email, FullName, IsMale, PhoneNumber, Place, DATE_FORMAT(Birthday, '%d/%m/%Y') as Birthday, Image, PersonID, PointsAverage, UserTypeID FROM useraccounts WHERE UserAccountID = ?
postCheckInforLogin: SELECT UserAccountID, Username, UserTypeID FROM useraccounts WHERE Username = ? and Password = ?
postSignUpForAllUser: INSERT INTO useraccounts ( Email , Username , Password , FullName , UserTypeID) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?)
updateProfileInform: UPDATE useraccounts SET FullName=?, IsMale=?, PhoneNumber=?, Place=?, Birthday=STR_TO_DATE(?, '%d/%m/%Y'), Image=?, PersonID=? WHERE UserAccountID = ?
